description: The objective of the project is to increase the communication between public and democratic institutions regarding pertinent issues highlighted by biannual research.

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: Public Pulse Project is a continuation of KEWS and will continue the work on research and analysis of pertinent issues and serve as a watchdog initiative that will constructively engage the Government of Kosovo and Public Institutions. In cooperation with the Kosovo institutions it will also continue to develop and advocate for preventive measures to assure stability, through increased dialogue between governmental institutions and Kosovo citizens.
subproject.title: Kosovo Public Pulse Opinion Po

title: Kosovo Public Pulse Opinion Polls PP-Polls
